name: The Idolmaster: Cinderella Girls - Gravure for You! Vol.4
summary:
This volume continues the ability to take pictures of two idols at a time, and to add music from CDs into the BGM list.
Idol Focus: Rika Jougasaki
Costumes: Summer Grace One-piece, Smile Blazer, Abyssal Majesty
Locations: Sunflower Field, House Studio, Nighttime Beach
